name: OntheRecordwithJohnEnsslin
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des: On the Record is All Things North Jersey. Our podcast provides an in-depth and behind the scenes look at the major stories of the day through conversations with news makers and Record journalists. The topics covered include sports, health, politics, entertainment, food, business and local history.
